{{Description|Conquer the high seas! Pursue the waves and chase the storm!}}
'''Tidecaller''' is [[Beidou]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* This skill generates '''2''' [[Elemental Particle]]s when it hits at least 1 target, or up to '''4''' when it hits with energy stored.
*The skill description is somewhat misleading. The Press skill has the same functionality as the Hold skill (including the shield and energy storing), but only during a very brief window.
*After holding the skill for about 3 seconds, the attack will be released automatically.
*If the shield breaks, the player will take the rest of the remaining damage used to break the shield.
*The shield created by this skill lasts for a short duration even after the skill button is released, allowing the skill's DMG to trigger the effects of [[Geo Resonance]].

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
*{{TalentNote|character=Beidou|talent=Tidecaller|ascension|1|Retribution}}
*{{TalentNote|character=Beidou|talent=Tidecaller|ascension|2|Lightning Storm|enhances Beidou's attacks for 10 seconds after unleashing Tidecaller with its maximum DMG Bonus as follows:}}
** The DMG and Attack SPD of Beidou's Normal and Charged Attacks are increased by 15%.
** The wind-up before Beidou begins Charged Attacks is reduced.

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
*{{TalentNote|constellation|3|Summoner of Storm}}
